mapper.select: select * from (select rownum as rnum, p.*from (select /* + index_desc(pro pro_pk_pro_no) */ pro_no proNo, host_no hostNo, program_name programName, ca_b_no caBNo, ca_s_no caSNo, profile from pro) p where rownum<=#{endRowNum}) where rnum>=#{startRowNum}
mapper.insert: insert into course(course_no, users_no, open_no, pro_no, host_no, enabled) values(100, #{usersNo}, #{openNo}, #{proNo}, #{hostNo}, 0)
